finalproject

Class Shopper

  • java.lang.Object
    • finalproject.User
      • finalproject.Shopper

  • public class Shopper
extends User
    Author:
    JLAI This class works as an authenticated Shopper. Each Shopper has its own shopping cart, list of Invoice, and its own address. The shopping cart is a HashMap, which its key is the Product object and the value is the quantity that this Shopper orders. The list of Invoice is an ArrayList of Invoice that stores all the previous purchase for this Shopper as a Invoice class objects. Each Shopper also has its own userId and password in order to login to the program.

      • addtoCart

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> addtoCart(Product product,
                                                       int backorder)
        Adding the required Product with the order quantity to this Shopper's own shopping cart
        Parameters:
        product - -> Product class Object which the Shopper wish to purchase
        backorder - -> Amount of the Product that this Shopper wish to purchase
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of String that stores all Distribution Centers that are able to provide that amount of quantity needed by this Shopper, otherwise return an empty ArrayList

      • filterMerchandise

        public java.util.ArrayList<Product> filterMerchandise(Inventory inventory,
                                                      Category category,
                                                      int max_price,
                                                      int min_price)
        Methods for this Shopper to filter the wanted merchandise based on Category and price-range
        Parameters:
        inventory - -> the Inventory that store all the products, which the method(filterMerchadise) inside this Inventory object is used as filtering
        category - -> the Category of merchandise that the Shopper is looking for
        max_price - -> Maximum price range of merchandises that the Shopper is looking for
        min_price - -> Minimum price range of merchandises that the Shopper is looking for
        Returns:
        -> Return an ArrayList of products that fits within this criteria
